00001 /* 
00002  *      tt.dcblock~
00003  *      External object for Max/MSP
00004  *      Remove DC Offsets from a signal (mono or stereo operation)

00012 #include "ext.h"                                        // Max Header
00013 #include "z_dsp.h"                                      // MSP Header
00014 #include "ext_strings.h"                        // String Functions
00015 #include "commonsyms.h"                         // Common symbols used by the Max 4.5 API
00016 #include "ext_obex.h"                           // Max Object Extensions (attributes) Header
00017 
00018 #include "TTDCBlock.h"                          // TTBlue Interfaces...

00020 
00021 // Data Structure for this object
00022 typedef struct _dcblock {
00023     t_pxobject          obj;
00024     void                        *obex;
00025         TTDCBlock               *dcblock;
00026         TTAudioSignal   *audioIn;
00027         TTAudioSignal   *audioOut;
00028         long                    attrBypass;
00029         long                    maxNumChannels;
00030 } t_dcblock;
00031 
00032 
00033 // Prototypes for methods: need a method for each incoming message type
00034 void*           dcblock_new(t_symbol *msg, short argc, t_atom *argv);                                   // New Object Creation Method
00035 void            dcblock_free(t_dcblock *x);
00036 void            dcblock_assist(t_dcblock *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst);   // Assistance Method
00037 t_int*          dcblock_perform(t_int *w);                                                                                              // An MSP Perform (signal) Method
00038 void            dcblock_dsp(t_dcblock *x, t_signal **sp, short *count);                                 // DSP Method
00039 void            dcblock_clear(t_dcblock *x);
00040 t_max_err       dcblock_setBypass(t_dcblock *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv);
00041 
00042 
00043 // Globals
00044 t_class *dcblock_class;                         // Required. Global pointing to this class
00045 
00046 
00047 /************************************************************************************/
00048 // Main() Function
00049 
00050 int main(void)
00051 {
00052         long attrflags = 0;
00053         t_class *c;
00054         t_object *attr;
00055         
00056         common_symbols_init();
00057 
00058         c = class_new("tt.dcblock~",(method)dcblock_new, (method)dcblock_free, (short)sizeof(t_dcblock), 
00059                 (method)0L, A_GIMME, 0);
00060         class_obexoffset_set(c, calcoffset(t_dcblock, obex));
00061 
00062         class_addmethod(c, (method)dcblock_clear,                       "clear",        0L);            
00063         class_addmethod(c, (method)dcblock_dsp,                         "dsp",          A_CANT, 0L);            
00064         class_addmethod(c, (method)dcblock_assist,                      "assist",       A_CANT, 0L); 
00065 
00066         attr = attr_offset_new("bypass", _sym_long, attrflags,
00067                 (method)0L,(method)dcblock_setBypass, calcoffset(t_dcblock, attrBypass));
00068         class_addattr(c, attr); 
00069 
00070         class_dspinit(c);                                               // Setup object's class to work with MSP
00071         class_register(CLASS_BOX, c);
00072         dcblock_class = c;
00073 
00074         return 0;
00075 }
00076 
00077 
00078 /************************************************************************************/
00079 // Object Creation Method
00080 
00081 void* dcblock_new(t_symbol *msg, short argc, t_atom *argv)
00082 {
00083     t_dcblock   *x;
00084         TTValue         sr(sys_getsr());
00085         long            attrstart = attr_args_offset(argc, argv);               // support normal arguments
00086         short           i;
00087    
00088     x = (t_dcblock *)object_alloc(dcblock_class);
00089     if(x){
00090                 x->attrBypass = 0;
00091                 x->maxNumChannels = 2;          // An initial argument to this object will set the maximum number of channels
00092                 if(attrstart && argv)
00093                         x->maxNumChannels = atom_getlong(argv);
00094 
00095                 attr_args_process(x,argc,argv);                         // handle attribute args        
00096                                 
00097         object_obex_store((void *)x, _sym_dumpout, (object *)outlet_new(x,NULL));       // dumpout      
00098             dsp_setup((t_pxobject *)x, x->maxNumChannels);                                                              // inlets
00099                 for(i=0; i < x->maxNumChannels; i++)
00100                         outlet_new((t_pxobject *)x, "signal");                                                                  // outlets
00101                 
00102                 x->obj.z_misc = Z_NO_INPLACE;
00103 
00104                 TTAudioObject::setGlobalParameterValue(TT("sr"), sr);
00105 //              TTObject::globalObject.setGlobalParameterValue(TT("sr"), sr);
00106                 
00107                 x->dcblock = new TTDCBlock(x->maxNumChannels);
00108                 x->audioIn = new TTAudioSignal(x->maxNumChannels);
00109                 x->audioOut = new TTAudioSignal(x->maxNumChannels);
00110         }
00111         return (x);                                                                             // Return the pointer
00112 }
00113 
00114 // Memory Deallocation
00115 void dcblock_free(t_dcblock *x)
00116 {
00117         dsp_free((t_pxobject *)x);
00118         delete x->dcblock;
00119         delete x->audioIn;
00120         delete x->audioOut;
00121 }

00124 /************************************************************************************/
00125 // Methods bound to input/inlets
00126 
00127 // Method for Assistance Messages
00128 void dcblock_assist(t_dcblock *x, void *b, long msg, long arg, char *dst)
00129 {
00130         if(msg==1)      // Inlets
00131                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) input, control messages");                
00132         else if(msg==2) // Outlets
00133                 strcpy(dst, "(signal) Filtered output");
00134         #pragma unused(x)
00135         #pragma unused(b)
00136         #pragma unused(arg)
00137 }
00138 
00139 
00140 void dcblock_clear(t_dcblock *x)
00141 {
00142         x->dcblock->sendMessage("clear");
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00146 // Perform (signal) Method
00147 t_int *dcblock_perform(t_int *w)
00148 {
00149         t_dcblock       *x = (t_dcblock *)(w[1]);
00150         short           i, j;
00151         
00152         for(i=0; i < x->audioIn->numChannels; i++){
00153                 j = (i*2) + 1;
00154                 x->audioIn->setVector(i, (t_float *)(w[j+1]));
00155                 x->audioOut->setVector(i, (t_float *)(w[j+2]));
00156         }
00157 
00158         if(!x->obj.z_disabled)                                                                  // if we are not muted...
00159                 x->dcblock->process(*x->audioIn, *x->audioOut);         // Actual DC-Blocker process
00160 
00161         return w + ((x->audioIn->numChannels*2)+2);                             // +2 = +1 for the x pointer and +1 to point to the next object
00162 }
00163 
00164 
00165 // DSP Method
00166 void dcblock_dsp(t_dcblock *x, t_signal **sp, short *count)
00167 {
00168         short   i, j, k=0;
00169         void    **audioVectors = NULL;
00170         
00171         audioVectors = (void**)sysmem_newptr(sizeof(void*) * ((x->maxNumChannels * 2) + 1));
00172         audioVectors[k] = x;
00173         k++;
00174         
00175         x->audioIn->numChannels = 0;
00176         x->audioOut->numChannels = 0;   
00177         for(i=0; i < x->maxNumChannels; i++){
00178                 j = x->maxNumChannels + i;
00179                 if(count[i] && count[j]){
00180                         audioVectors[k] = sp[i]->s_vec;
00181                         x->audioIn->numChannels++;
00182                         x->audioIn->vs = sp[i]->s_n;
00183                         k++;
00184                         audioVectors[k] = sp[j]->s_vec;
00185                         x->audioOut->numChannels++;
00186                         x->audioIn->vs = sp[j]->s_n;
00187                         k++;
00188                 }
00189         }
00190         
00191         x->dcblock->setParameterValue(TT("sr"), sp[0]->s_sr);
00192         
00193         dsp_addv(dcblock_perform, k, audioVectors);
00194         sysmem_freeptr(audioVectors);
00195 }
00196 
00197 
00198 t_max_err dcblock_setBypass(t_dcblock *x, void *attr, long argc, t_atom *argv)
00199 {
00200         TTSymbol        name("bypass");
00201         TTValue         value;
00202 
00203         if(argc){
00204                 value = x->attrBypass = atom_getlong(argv);
00205                 x->dcblock->setParameterValue(name, value);
00206         }
00207         return MAX_ERR_NONE;
00208 }
